name: YOLO Dev (Built at 2am)
description: Tactical fixes for critical gaps - shore up what you skipped when shipping fast
objectives: Identify and fix critical security vulnerabilities
Add basic monitoring and incident response

milestones.name: Critical Security Fixes
milestones.description: Address security gaps that could bite you

steps.why: List 3 things an attacker could do - takes 15 minutes, could save your app

checkpoint.question: Have you identified at least 3 potential threats to your system?

steps.why: Fix SQL injection, XSS, and other critical vulnerabilities
Get credentials out of your code before someone finds them

checkpoint.question: Are all secrets removed from version control?

steps.why: Run basic security scans to find obvious issues

milestones.name: Production Survival Kit
milestones.description: Essential operations to keep things running

steps.why: Ship with a rollback plan - because things WILL break
Get alerted when things break so you can fix them at 9am, not 2am
Have a way to recover from data loss or catastrophic failures
Know what to do when things go wrong (they will)

milestones.name: Quality Baseline
milestones.description: Minimum testing to catch obvious bugs

steps.why: Test critical paths so users don't find your bugs first
Even solo devs benefit from a second look at code

completion_criteria: Critical security vulnerabilities identified and mitigated
Basic monitoring and alerting in place
next_steps: Once immediate fires are out, consider Production Ready track
For deeper security work, review Security Hardening track
Set up regular retrospectives to prevent future 2am coding sessions
